keys.name: Rusty Iron Key
keys.description: A small iron key, tarnished with age. Its simple design suggests it opens a basic lock.

keys.name: Brass Door Key
keys.description: A polished brass key with ornate engravings along its shaft. It appears well-maintained.

keys.name: Steel Gate Key
keys.description: A heavy steel key with a complex bit pattern. This key opens an important lock.

keys.name: Silver Mansion Key
keys.description: An elegant silver key with fine craftsmanship. It bears the seal of a noble house.

keys.name: Golden Treasury Key
keys.description: A magnificent golden key adorned with precious gems. This key opens only the most valuable vaults.

keys.name: Skeleton Key
keys.description: A master key capable of opening multiple locks. Its intricate design allows it to bypass simple mechanisms.

keys.name: Mithril Dungeon Key
keys.description: A lightweight yet incredibly strong key forged from mithril. It glows faintly with magical energy.

keys.name: Obsidian Prison Key
keys.description: A dark, sinister-looking key carved from obsidian. Dark magic seems to emanate from its surface.

keys.name: Crystal Tower Key
keys.description: A translucent key made of pure crystal. Light refracts through it in mesmerizing patterns.

keys.name: Ancient Rune Key
keys.description: An artifact from a forgotten age, covered in glowing runes. This key can open magically sealed doors.
